item.title: Te Wiki O Te Reo Māori
item.description: Māori Language Week It’s Māori language week and since people are arguing over the language and it’s in the news again, I thought I’d weigh in on the debate if you can even call it that. First, here’s a list of reasons people give not to learn Māori: It’s a dead dying language It’s a dead dying culture (Some idea of superiority) You get the idea Secondly, I would like to say I’m a linguist, or to be more exact, I’m studying linguistics.
